mapper.sql: user_id, province_id, city_id, usergroup_id, area_id, user_name, password, question, answer, cnname, enname, avatar, sex, birthtype, birth_year, birth_month, birth_day, astro, bloodtype, trade, cardtype, cardnum, cardpic, email, qqnum, mobile, address, zipcode, enteruser, regtime, regip, logintime, loginip, qqid, weiboid
mapper.select: select *from user where user_name=#{userName} or email=#{email} or mobile=#{mobile}
mapper.insert: insert into user (user_id, province_id, city_id, usergroup_id, area_id, user_name, password, question, answer, cnname, enname, avatar, sex, birthtype, birth_year, birth_month, birth_day, astro, bloodtype, trade, cardtype, cardnum, cardpic, email, qqnum, mobile, address, zipcode, enteruser, regtime, regip, logintime, loginip, qqid, weiboid, intro ) values (#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{provinceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{usergroupId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{areaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{question,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{answer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cnname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{birthtype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{birthYear,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthMonth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthDay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{astro,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bloodtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardtype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cardnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardpic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qqnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zipcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enteruser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{regtime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{regip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{logintime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{loginip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qqid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weiboid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{intro,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )

update user
province_id = #{provinceId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
city_id = #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

cardtype = #{cardtype,jdbcType=INTEGER},

where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
